key_responsibilities: handling other administrative duties as they arise, including processing mail and faxes

key_responsibilities: meet with constituents concerning policy matters

Two years of relevant policy experience preferred

key_responsibilities: efficient and accurate management of all aspects of the member’s daily and long-term schedule

prior experience in a political office or public relations agency
proficient in graphic design, photography, videography, video editing, and use of social media

key_responsibilities: providing a high volume of ethics advice, education, and training to Members of Congress and their staff through frequent telephone calls, in-person meetings, and written work product
requirements: outstanding analytical and written and oral communication skills

Experience in one or more of the following areas is desirable: government ethics; ethics counseling and training; corporate finance; securities law; employment law, including the laws governing sexual harassment in the workplace; and criminal law

strong interpersonal skills and a willingness to work in a team environment
prior legislative experience on Capitol Hill is preferred

managing online communications and writing press releases, speeches and op-eds
